headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Vertex Pharmaceuticals’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Vertex Pharmaceuticals encountered a challenging first quarter in 2025, as both revenue and non-GAAP profit fell short of Wall Street expectations, leading to a significant negative market reaction. Management attributed the subdued performance to factors including slower-than-anticipated uptake for newly launched products and specific regional pressures, such as a decline in ex-U.S. cystic fibrosis (CF) revenues due to market dynamics in Russia.
